sentences: Santos Montano is a drummer from Santa Fe, New Mexico.
He has worked for both series productions (e.g. Marvel's Daredevil, released in 2015) as well as for movie productions (e.g. Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb).
Mickey Rookey Live at London (2016, Ektro)
Zozoburn: Live at Fiesta Roadburn with Zozobra (2020, Sige)
